## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d2589f412ba2d1d77496b25ded7025ae537a4f57744738142de8915dd2484f2c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ui-platform-elements' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
